overview:
Enthusiastic, Team Player. Passionate about creating fun, compelling and addictive user experiences via social media. Strong organizational and analytical skills with attention to detail.

Specialties

Social Media - Marketing, Optimization, Monetization and Strategy.

Internet - Usability, UI, Online user behavior, ORM.

Social Apps - Rich Internet Applications, Ideation and Development.

Digital (Web) - Help brands in consumption of content to gain more visibility.

Specialties Online Reputation Management, Branding and Identity, Social Business Communications, SEO, Application Development
